trans-unit.source: Specifies that a SAML assertion is addressed to a particular audience.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 SAML 判斷提示定址到特定的對象。

trans-unit.source: The SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition class corresponds to the `<saml:AudienceRestrictionCondition>` XML element, which is defined in the OASIS SAML 1.1 specification.
trans-unit.target: SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition 類別會對應到`<saml:AudienceRestrictionCondition>`XML 項目，定義在 OASIS SAML 1.1 規格中。

trans-unit.source: The SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition is one of several <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions> that can be used to scope a SAML assertion Use the SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition class to specify a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion> is intended for a specific audience and that the issuing SAML authority does not warrant the SAML assertion for other audiences that receive the security token.
trans-unit.target: SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition 是一種<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions>，可以用來限定範圍的 SAML 判斷提示使用的 SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition 類別來指定<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion>也無需針對特定對象核發的 SAML 授權單位並不保證其他對象接收安全性權杖的 SAML 判斷提示。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions>

trans-unit.source: The claims for <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security tokens are expressed as part of a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion>, which can optionally have a set of conditions affect the validity of the assertion.
trans-unit.target: 宣告<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken>安全性權杖會表示為部分<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion>，且可以選擇性地包含一組條件影響的判斷提示之有效性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken>

trans-unit.source: One of those conditions is a SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition, which specifies that the assertion is addressed to one or more specific audiences.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個條件是指定判斷提示定址到一或多個特定對象 SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition。

trans-unit.source: The issuing SAML authority cannot prevent an unintended recipient from taking action on the basis of the information provided in the SAML assertion.
trans-unit.target: 發行的 SAML 授權單位無法避免未知收件者採取動作以 SAML 判斷提示中提供的資訊為基礎。

trans-unit.source: However, the SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition class allows the SAML authority to state explicitly that no warranty is provided to such a party in a machine- and human-readable form.
trans-unit.target: 不過，SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition 類別允許 SAML 授權單位，可提供不提供任何瑕疵的合作對象這類機器及人類看得懂的格式明確陳述。

trans-unit.source: To specify the set of intended audiences, use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition.%23ctor%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.Uri%7D%29> constructor that accepts a set of audiences.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定象的集合，使用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition.%23ctor%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.Uri%7D%29>接受對象集合建構函式。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition.%23ctor%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.Uri%7D%29>

trans-unit.source: To get the set of intended audiences, access the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition.Audiences%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得象的集合，存取<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition.Audiences%2A>屬性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition.Audiences%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition"></xref> class with the specified set of audiences a SAML assertion is intended for.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition"></xref>具有指定的對象的 SAML 判斷提示的集合類別。

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition.Audiences%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式設定<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition.Audiences%2A>屬性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition.Audiences%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> of type <xref:System.Uri> that contain a set of intended audiences.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>型別的<xref:System.Uri>包含象的集合。</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: audiences is .
trans-unit.target: audiencesis .

trans-unit.source: Gets the set of audiences a SAML assertion is intended for.
trans-unit.target: 取得的對象的 SAML 判斷提示的集合。

trans-unit.source: To set the Audiences property, use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition.%23ctor%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.Uri%7D%29> constructor that accepts a set of audiences.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定的對象屬性，請使用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition.%23ctor%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.Uri%7D%29>接受對象集合建構函式。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition.%23ctor%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.Uri%7D%29>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> of type <xref:System.Uri> that contain a set of intended audiences.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601>型別的<xref:System.Uri>包含象的集合。</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the properties of this instance are read-only.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出這個執行個體的屬性是否是唯讀狀態。

trans-unit.source: To make this instance of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition> class read-only, call the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition.MakeReadOnly%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要讓這個執行個體<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition>類別唯讀的呼叫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition.MakeReadOnly%2A>方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition.MakeReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the properties of this instance are read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果這個執行個體的屬性是唯讀的;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Causes this instance to be read-only.
trans-unit.target: 使得這個執行個體處於唯讀模式。

trans-unit.source: When the MakeReadOnly method is called, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition.IsReadOnly%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 MakeReadOnly 方法時，<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition.IsReadOnly%2A>屬性設定為`true`。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition.IsReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: Reads the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<AudienceRestrictionCondition>" name="<AudienceRestrictionCondition>" href=""></xref> element from the specified XML reader.
trans-unit.target: 讀取<xref uid="langword_csharp_<AudienceRestrictionCondition>" name="<AudienceRestrictionCondition>" href=""></xref>從指定的 XML 讀取器的項目。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader> to read the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<AudienceRestrictionCondition>" name="<AudienceRestrictionCondition>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader>讀取<xref uid="langword_csharp_<AudienceRestrictionCondition>" name="<AudienceRestrictionCondition>" href=""></xref>項目。</xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"></xref> that is capable of reading XML elements in the SAML assertion that are defined in the SAML specification.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"> </xref>能夠讀取 SAML 規格中定義的 SAML 判斷提示的 XML 項目。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"></xref> that reads the <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""></xref> clause of the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"> </xref>讀取<xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""></xref>子句的數位簽章。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref> that determines the security token that created the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"> </xref> ，判定建立數位簽章的安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: reader is .
trans-unit.target: readeris .

trans-unit.source: -or- samlSerializer is .
trans-unit.target: -or- samlSerializer is .

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_<AudienceRestrictionCondition>" name="<AudienceRestrictionCondition>" href=""></xref> element has a child <xref uid="langword_csharp_<Audience>" name="<Audience>" href=""></xref> element does not have a value.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_<AudienceRestrictionCondition>" name="<AudienceRestrictionCondition>" href=""> </xref>項目具有子系<xref uid="langword_csharp_<Audience>" name="<Audience>" href=""></xref>元素的值不能。

trans-unit.source: Writes the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<AudienceRestrictionCondition>" name="<AudienceRestrictionCondition>" href=""></xref> element into the specified XML serializer.
trans-unit.target: 寫入<xref uid="langword_csharp_<AudienceRestrictionCondition>" name="<AudienceRestrictionCondition>" href=""></xref>項目至指定的 XML 序列化程式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter> to write the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<AudienceRestrictionCondition>" name="<AudienceRestrictionCondition>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter>寫入<xref uid="langword_csharp_<AudienceRestrictionCondition>" name="<AudienceRestrictionCondition>" href=""></xref>項目。</xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"></xref> that is capable of writing XML elements in the SAML assertion that is defined in the SAML specification.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"> </xref>能夠在 SAML 規格中所定義的 SAML 判斷提示中撰寫 XML 項目。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"></xref> that is capable of writing <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""></xref> clauses.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"> </xref>能夠寫入<xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""></xref>子句。

trans-unit.source: writer is .
trans-unit.target: writeris .
